Features

Authentication Methods (16 Total)

Modern Authentication

  • Session-based (cookies)
  • JWT tokens
  • API keys
  • OAuth 2.0
  • OpenID Connect

Enterprise/Federated

  • SAML (IdP/SP)
  • Social login
  • LDAP/Active Directory
  • Kerberos/NTLM

Advanced Security

  • Multi-factor (TOTP)
  • Passwordless (magic links)
  • WebAuthn/FIDO2
  • mTLS certificates

Legacy/Specialized

  • HTTP Basic/Digest
  • HMAC signed requests
  • Static tokens

Request Routing

Forward authenticated requests to target services with user context.

REST Protocol

Support for GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH with authentication forwarding.

SOAP Protocol

Parse SOAP envelopes and route to target services.
